case_name: Hook v. Retrieval-Masters Creditors Bureau, Inc.

docket_entries.description: COMPLAINT with JURY DEMAND against Retrieval-Masters Creditors Bureau, Inc. ( Filing fee $ 400 paid - receipt number: 0648-4522269), filed by Karla Hook. (Attachments: # 1 Exhibit A, # 2 Exhibit B, # 3 Civil Cover Sheet, # 4 Summons Form) (Weiss, Ronald) (Entered: 04/11/2014)

Summons Issued as to Retrieval-Masters Creditors Bureau, Inc. (sr1) (Entered: 04/11/2014)
MOTION to Stay re 2 MOTION to Certify Class by Plaintiff Karla Hook. (Weiss, Ronald) (Entered: 04/11/2014)

MOTION for Leave to Appear Pro Hac Vice of Michael Greenwald (Filing fee $ 200, receipt number 0648-4522983) by Plaintiff Karla Hook. (Attachments: # 1 Certificate of Good Standing) (Weiss, Ronald) (Entered: 04/11/2014)
ORDER granting 5 Motion for Leave to Appear Pro Hac Vice of Michael Greenwald. Signed by Magistrate Judge Norah McCann King on 4/14/2014. (pes1) (Entered: 04/14/2014)
NOTICE of Appearance by Jeffrey Charles Turner for Defendant Retrieval-Masters Creditors Bureau, Inc. (Turner, Jeffrey) (Entered: 05/07/2014)

ANSWER to 1 Complaint, filed by Retrieval-Masters Creditors Bureau, Inc.. (Shaver, David) (Entered: 05/07/2014)
Corporate Disclosure Statement by Defendant Retrieval-Masters Creditors Bureau, Inc.. (Shaver, David) (Entered: 05/07/2014)
NOTICE of Hearing:Preliminary Pretrial Conference set for 6/25/2014 02:00 PM before Magistrate Judge Norah McCann King. (jr1) (Entered: 05/20/2014)
RULE 26(f) REPORT by Plaintiff Karla Hook. (Greenwald, Michael) (Entered: 06/03/2014)

PRELIMINARY PRETRIAL ORDER: This case is referred to the December 2014 SETTLEMENT WEEK. Joinder of Parties due by 10/3/2014. Motions to Amend due by 10/3/2014. Primary Expert due by 1/9/2015. Rebuttal Expert due by 2/27/2015. Discovery due by 4/3/2015. Dispositive motions due by 5/8/2015. Final Pretrial Conference ready by 9/2015. Plaintiff's motion to certifya plaintiff class, ECF 2, is DENIED without prejudice to renewal by December 1, 2014. Plaintiff's motion to stay further proceedings on that motion, ECF 4, is DENIED as moot. Signed by Magistrate Judge Norah McCann King on 6/25/2014. (pes1) (Entered: 06/25/2014)
STIPULATED PROTECTIVE ORDER. Signed by Magistrate Judge Norah McCann King on 8/5/2014. (pes1) (Entered: 08/05/2014)
